subject: RE: [junit] Test File Output comparison : Should probably be an F AQ but I didn't see it so....
msgSnippet: ... Well, depends. If his functions are expecting a PrintWriter, what can you do... If they re expecting a Writer, you can feed a StringWriter. Bye, Robert
messageBody:
> I think, a StringWriter would be more appropriate...?

Well, depends. If his functions are expecting a PrintWriter, what can you
do...

If they're expecting a Writer, you can feed a StringWriter.

Bye,
Robert
